Thank you for creating your account with MySivana. Our goal is to make it convenient for you to convert your bitcoins to fiat deposits to your bank account or to pick up cash at local merchants. You can also purchase goods and services within our merchant network and pay with bitcoin.
Please click on the link that has just been sent to your email account to verify and complete your registration process.
For questions or feedback please write to us %1$s or go to help section from app menu.

Thank you for expressing your interest in becoming a MySivana partner. Our goal is to make it convenient for our customers to use bitcoin and convert it to cash or use them to purchase goods and services from local merchants like you.
One of our customer service representatives will contact you to complete the your paperwork.
For questions or feedback please write to us %1$s
Internal Server Error, try after sometime.
Your email must be verified to initiate any transactions.

string-array.name: welcome_desc
string-array.item: To enjoy quick and easy exchange of BTC to your local currency platform.
With just a click you can exchange your BTC to your local currency.
Find nearby MySivana servicing store to collect your local currency.

resources.string: No transactions on your account. If you think this message is incorrect, please %1$s to use Help section to call us.
Transaction amount cannot be more than INR 49,999.
Please check the details before you proceed, make sure that name matches with a government issued identification card for our merchants to verify.
Please check the details before you proceed, make sure that name matches with name of the account owner into whose account the direct deposit is to be made
Hey, %1$s to know the rules of the contest.

"The aim of this contest is to collect SIVA (MySivana) Tokens. You collect SIVA Tokens by transacting. Whatâ€™s more, you can collect more every time your friends by inviting them to use the system.
This promotion ends when the count of users in the MySivana app reaches 10,000.
When you sign up, you receive two SIVA tokens. Another way to earn SIVA tokens is by referring friends and family to the MySivana application. Every time a new user signs up with your referral code , you will receive 1 SIVA token. If the new user performs a transaction, you will get 1 additional SIVA token.
For all subsequent transactions, only the user who initiated the transaction will receive 1 SIVA tokens for every 1000 rupees in the transaction.
Fractions of 1000 rupees are ignored in assigning Tokens. For example, if the user sends 14,500 rupees then the user will receive 14 Tokens.
When the promotion ends, the top 3 users with the highest SIVA tokens will be the winners. The first prize winner will receive 30 grams of gold, second prize winner receives 20 grams of gold and third prize winner will receive 10 grams of gold.
In case of a tie in the SIVA tokens, the user who reached the SIVA tokens count first will be the winner for any of the top 3 positions.
In the future, these SIVA tokens will be listed on the popular exchanges as a ERC 20 token. As the MySivana network grows, the tokens will grow in value."
Get a chance to win gold coins
